Intangible assets are assets, not including financial assets, lacking physical substance.

InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.description: Represents the total of interest and dividend income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, earned from (1) loans and leases whether held-for-sale or held-in-portfolio; (2) investment securities; (3) federal funds sold; (4) securities purchased under agreements to resell; (5) investments in banker's acceptances, commercial paper, or certificates of deposit; (6) dividend income; or (7) other investments not otherwise specified herein.

InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.label: Interest and Fee Income, Loans and Leases
InterestAndFeeIncomeLoansAndLeases.description: The aggregate interest and fee income generated by: (1) loans the Entity has positive intent and ability to hold for the foreseeable future, or until maturity or payoff, including commercial and consumer loans, whether domestic or foreign, which may consist of: (a) industrial and agricultural; (b) real estate; and (c) real estate construction loans; (d) trade financing; (e) lease financing; (f) home equity lines-of-credit; (g) automobile and other vehicle loans; and (h) credit card and other revolving-type loans and (2) loans and leases held-for-sale which may include mortgage loans, direct financing, and sales-type leases.

InterestBearingDepositLiabilities.label: Interest-bearing Deposit Liabilities
InterestBearingDepositLiabilities.description: The aggregate of all domestic and foreign interest-bearing deposit liabilities.

InterestExpense.label: Interest Expense
InterestExpense.description: Amount of the cost of borrowed funds accounted for as interest expense.

InterestExpenseBorrowings.label: Interest Expense, Borrowings
InterestExpenseBorrowings.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all borrowings.

InterestExpenseDeposits.label: Interest Expense, Deposits
InterestExpenseDeposits.description: Aggregate amount of interest expense on all deposits.

InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.label: Interest Income (Expense), after Provision for Loan Loss
InterestIncomeExpenseAfterProvisionForLo.description: Amount of interest income or expense, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, including consideration of the provisions for loan, lease, credit, and other related losses.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestIncomeSecuritiesTaxable.label: Interest Income, Securities, Operating, Taxable
InterestIncomeSecuritiesTaxable.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities subject to state, federal and other income tax.

InterestIncomeSecuritiesTaxExempt.label: Interest Income, Securities, Operating, Tax Exempt
InterestIncomeSecuritiesTaxExempt.description: Amount of operating interest income, including amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts, on securities exempt from state, federal and other income tax.

InterestPaidNet.label: Interest Paid, Excluding Capitalized Interest, Operating Activities
InterestPaidNet.description: Amount of cash paid for interest, excluding capitalized interest, classified as operating activity. Includes, but is not limited to, payment to settle zero-coupon bond for accreted interest of debt discount and debt instrument with insignificant coupon interest rate in relation to effective interest rate of borrowing attributable to accreted interest of debt discount.

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentBankingRevenue.label: Investment Banking Revenue
InvestmentBankingRevenue.description: Includes (1) underwriting revenue (the spread between the resale price received and the cost of the securities and related expenses) generated through the purchasing, distributing and reselling of new issues of securities (alternatively, could be a secondary offering of a large block of previously issued securities); and (2) fees earned for mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, restructurings, and other types of financial advisory services.

InvestmentTaxCredit.label: Investment Tax Credit
InvestmentTaxCredit.description: The amount deducted from an entities' taxes, reflecting a percentage of an amount invested in certain assets spread over the useful life of those assets; includes deferred investment tax credits.

LaborAndRelatedExpense.label: Labor and Related Expense
LaborAndRelatedExpense.description: Amount of expense for salary, wage, profit sharing; incentive and equity-based compensation; and other employee benefit.

LeaseAndRentalExpense.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense
LeaseAndRentalExpense.description: Amount of rent expense incurred for leased assets, including but not limited to, furniture and equipment, that is not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LitigationReserve.label: Estimated Litigation Liability
LitigationReserve.description: Aggregate carrying amount of the estimated litigation liability for known or estimated probable loss from litigation, which may include attorneys' fees and other litigation costs.

LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.description: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

LitigationSettlementExpense.label: Litigation Settlement, Expense
LitigationSettlementExpense.description: Amount of litigation expense, including but not limited to legal, forensic, accounting, and investigative fees.

LoanProcessingFee.label: Loan Processing Fee
LoanProcessingFee.description: Expenses paid for obtaining loans which includes expenses such as application and origination fees.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Allowance
LoansAndLeasesReceivableAllowance.description: Amount of allowance to cover probable credit losses on loans and leases. Includes carryover of or adjustments to the allowance for loan losses in connection with business combinations. Excludes allowance for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableBeforeFeesGross.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, before Fees, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableBeforeFeesGross.description: Amount, before allowance and fees, of loans and leases receivable. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Gross
LoansAndLeasesReceivableGrossCarryingAmo.description: Amount before allowance of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Includes deferred interest and fees, undisbursed portion of loan balance, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net of Deferred Income
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetOfDeferredInc.description: Amount before allowance and after deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Net Amount
LoansAndLeasesReceivableNetReportedAmoun.description: Amount after allowance and deduction of deferred interest and fees, unamortized costs and premiums and discounts from face amounts, of loans and leases held in portfolio, including but not limited to, commercial and consumer loans. Excludes loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements and loans held for sale.

LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.label: Loans and Leases Receivable, Related Parties
LoansAndLeasesReceivableRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, reflects the carrying amount of unpaid loan amounts due from related parties at the balance sheet date.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleAmount.description: Amount, before valuation allowance, of financing receivable classified as held-for-sale.

LoansReceivableWithFixedRatesOfInterest1.label: Loans Receivable with Fixed Rates of Interest
LoansReceivableWithFixedRatesOfInterest1.description: Amount of loan with fixed rate of interest.

LoansReceivableWithVariableRatesOfIntere.label: Loans Receivable with Variable Rates of Interest
LoansReceivableWithVariableRatesOfIntere.description: Amount of loan with variable or adjustable rate of interest.

LongTermDebt.label: Long-term Debt
LongTermDebt.description: Amount, after unamortized (discount) premium and debt issuance costs, of long-term debt. Includes, but not limited to, notes payable, bonds payable, debentures, mortgage loans and commercial paper. Excludes capital lease obligations.

LossContingencyAccrualProvision.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Provision
LossContingencyAccrualProvision.description: Amount charged against operating income increasing loss contingency liability, after adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.

LossContingencyNumberOfPlaintiffs.label: Loss Contingency, Number of Plaintiffs
LossContingencyNumberOfPlaintiffs.description: Number of plaintiffs that have filed claims pertaining to a loss contingency.

MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.label: Marketing and Advertising Expense
MarketingAndAdvertisingExpense.description: The total expense recognized in the period for promotion, public relations, and brand or product advertising.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInInvestingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.label: Net Income (Loss) Available to Common Stockholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossAvailableToCommonStockholde.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) available to common shareholders.

NetInvestmentInLease.label: Net Investment in Lease
NetInvestmentInLease.description: Amount of net investment in sales-type and direct financing lease.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssum.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Debt Assumed
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionDebtAssum.description: "The amount of debt that an Entity assumes in acquiring a business or in consideration for an asset received in a noncash (or part noncash) acquisition. Noncash is defined as transactions during a period that affect recognized assets or liabilities but that do not result in cash receipts or cash payments in the period. ""Part noncash"" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period."

NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities.label: Noninterest-bearing Deposit Liabilities
NoninterestBearingDepositLiabilities.description: The aggregate amount of all domestic and foreign noninterest-bearing deposits liabilities held by the entity.

NoninterestExpense.label: Noninterest Expense
NoninterestExpense.description: Total aggregate amount of all noninterest expense.

NoninterestIncome.label: Noninterest Income
NoninterestIncome.description: The total amount of noninterest income which may be derived from: (1) fees and commissions; (2) premiums earned; (3) insurance policy charges; (4) the sale or disposal of assets; and (5) other sources not otherwise specified.

NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.label: Noninterest Income, Other Operating Income
NoninterestIncomeOtherOperatingIncome.description: Amount of revenue earned, classified as other, excluding interest income.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

OccupancyNet.label: Occupancy, Net
OccupancyNet.description: Amount of net occupancy expense that may include items, such as depreciation of facilities and equipment, lease expenses, property taxes and property and casualty insurance expense.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDue.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable letter-terms in excess of one year.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Due, Next Twelve Months
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueC.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the next fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the fourth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the third fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueI.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due in the second fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Due Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsDueT.description: Amount of required minimum rental payments for operating leases having an initial or remaining non-cancelable lease term in excess of one year due after the fifth fiscal year following the latest fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Gain (Loss), after Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossAvailableFor.description: Amount, after adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) and tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetOfTaxPort.description: Amount after tax of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent entity.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment from AOCI for Sale of Securities, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) of reclassification adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income for unrealized gain (loss) realized upon the sale of available-for-sale securities.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Unrealized Holding Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeUnrealizedHoldin.description: Amount, before adjustment, of tax expense (benefit) for unrealized holding gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale). Excludes tax expense (benefit) for unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to available-for-sale.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

OtherNoninterestExpense.label: Other Noninterest Expense
OtherNoninterestExpense.description: Amount of noninterest expense classified as other.

OtherRealEstate.label: Other Real Estate
OtherRealEstate.description: Carrying amount of other real estate not separately disclosed, including, but not limited to, real estate investments, real estate loans that qualify as investments in real estate, and premises that are no longer used in operations may also be included in real estate owned. This does not include real estate assets taken in settlement of troubled loans through surrender or foreclosure.

PaymentsForLegalSettlements.label: Payments for Legal Settlements
PaymentsForLegalSettlements.description: The amount of cash paid for the settlement of litigation or for other legal issues during the period.

PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.label: Payments for Origination and Purchases of Loans Held-for-sale
PaymentsForOriginationAndPurchasesOfLoan.description: The aggregate amount of cash outflow for loans purchased and created with the intention to resell them in the near future.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans and Leases
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansAndLeases.description: The net cash outflow or inflow for the increase (decrease) in the beginning and end of period of loan and lease balances which are not originated or purchased specifically for resale. Includes cash payments and proceeds associated with (a) loans held-for-investment, (b) leases held-for-investment, and (c) both.

PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Loans Receivable
PaymentsForProceedsFromLoansReceivable.description: The net amount paid or received by the reporting entity associated with purchase (sale or collection) of loans receivable arising from the financing of goods and services.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.label: Payments for Repurchase of Common Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfCommonStock.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common stock during the period.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.label: Payments for Repurchase of Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfPreferredStockAnd.description: The cash outflow to reacquire preferred stock during the period.

PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
PaymentsOfDebtIssuanceCosts.description: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

PaymentsOfDividends.label: Payments of Dividends
PaymentsOfDividends.description: Cash outflow in the form of capital distributions and dividends to common shareholders, preferred shareholders and noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Preferred Stock and Preference Stock
PaymentsOfDividendsPreferredStockAndPref.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends to preferred shareholders of the parent entity.

PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.label: Payments to Acquire Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
PaymentsToAcquireAvailableForSaleSecurit.description: Amount of cash outflow to acquire investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses, Net of Cash Acquired
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesNetOfCashAcqu.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a business, net of the cash acquired from the purchase.

PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.label: Payment to Acquire Life Insurance Policy, Investing Activities
PaymentsToAcquireLifeInsurancePolicies.description: Amount of cash outflow for payment of premium on corporate-owned life insurance policy, classified as investing activities. Includes, but is not limited to, bank-owned life insurance policy.

PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipme.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.label: Payments to Fund Long-term Loans to Related Parties
PaymentsToFundLongtermLoansToRelatedPart.description: The cash outflow associated with extending a long-term loan to a related party. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances to Affiliates.

PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritie.label: Pledged Assets Separately Reported, Securities Pledged as Collateral, at Fair Value
PledgedAssetsSeparatelyReportedSecuritie.description: The sum of the fair values, as of the date of each statement of financial position presented, of securities that are restricted as collateral for the payment of related debt obligations, primarily secured borrowings and repurchase agreements, and that are reclassified and separately reported in the statement of financial position because the transferee has the right by contract or custom to sell or re-pledge them.

PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.label: Preferred Stock Dividends, Income Statement Impact
PreferredStockDividendsIncomeStatementIm.description: The amount of preferred stock dividends that is an adjustment to net income apportioned to common stockholders.

PreferredStockNoParValue.label: Preferred Stock, No Par Value
PreferredStockNoParValue.description: Face amount per share of no-par value preferred stock nonredeemable or redeemable solely at the option of the issuer.

PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Authorized
PreferredStockSharesAuthorized.description: The maximum number of nonredeemable preferred shares (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Shares Outstanding
PreferredStockSharesOutstanding.description: Aggregate share number for all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by stockholders. Does not include preferred shares that have been repurchased.

PreferredStockValueOutstanding.label: Preferred Stock, Value, Outstanding
PreferredStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by shareholders, which is net of related treasury stock. May be all or a portion of the number of preferred shares authorized. These shares represent the ownership interest of the preferred shareholders.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Other Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of long-term debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Including Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Subordinated Long-term Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSubordinatedLongTe.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.label: Proceeds from Maturities, Prepayments and Calls of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromMaturitiesPrepaymentsAndCall.description: Amount of cash inflow from maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.label: Proceeds from Related Party Debt
ProceedsFromRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash inflow from a long-term borrowing made from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances from Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Secured Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from long-term debt wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMat.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt, Maturing in Three Months or Less
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMat.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfAvailableFo.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale, maturity, prepayment and call of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Held-to-maturity Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfHeldToMatur.description: Amount of cash inflow from the sale or maturity of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.label: Proceeds from Sale of Debt Securities, Available-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfAvailableForSaleSecuri.description: Amount of cash inflow from sale of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Loans Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfLoansHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow resulting from the sale of loans classified as held-for-sale, including proceeds from loans sold through mortgage securitization.

ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Other Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfOtherRealEstate.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale of other real estate not otherwise defined in the taxonomy.

ProceedsFromSaleOfWhollyOwnedRealEstateA.label: Proceeds from Sale of Wholly Owned Real Estate and Real Estate Acquired in Settlement of Loans
ProceedsFromSaleOfWhollyOwnedRealEstateA.description: The cash inflow from proceeds From Sales of Wholly Owned Real Estate and Real Estate Acquired in Settlement of Loans.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt
ProceedsFromShortTermDebt.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Proceeds from Stock Options Exercised
ProceedsFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Amount of cash inflow from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

ProfessionalFees.label: Professional Fees
ProfessionalFees.description: A fee charged for services from professionals such as doctors, lawyers and accountants. The term is often expanded to include other professions, for example, pharmacists charging to maintain a medicinal profile of a client or customer.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentNet.description: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.label: Provision for Loan and Lease Losses
ProvisionForLoanAndLeaseLosses.description: Amount of expense related to estimated loss from loan and lease transactions.

ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.label: Financing Receivable, Credit Loss, Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForLoanLossesExpensed.description: Amount of credit loss expense (reversal of expense) for financing receivable.

ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.label: Provision for Other Credit Losses
ProvisionForOtherCreditLosses.description: Amount of expense related to credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions.

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RepaymentsOfAssumedDebt.label: Repayments of Assumed Debt
RepaymentsOfAssumedDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayments of a long-term debt originally issued by another party but is assumed by the entity.

RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfLongTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for debt initially having maturity due after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.label: Repayments of Related Party Debt
RepaymentsOfRelatedPartyDebt.description: The cash outflow for the payment of a long-term borrowing made from a related party where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Payments for Advances from Affiliates.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebt.description: The cash outflow for a borrowing having initial term of repayment within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInThree.label: Repayments of Short-term Debt, Maturing in Three Months or Less
RepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMaturingInThree.description: The cash outflow from a repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment within three months.

RepaymentsOfSubordinatedDebt.label: Repayments of Subordinated Debt
RepaymentsOfSubordinatedDebt.description: The cash outflow from the repayment of long-term borrowing where a lender is placed in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment (senior) in case of liquidation of the entity's assets or underlying collateral.

RestrictedInvestments.label: Restricted Investments
RestrictedInvestments.description: Investments which are not defined as or included in marketable (debt, equity, or other) securities whose use is restricted in whole or in part, generally by contractual agreements or regulatory requirements. For use in an unclassified balance sheet.

RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
RetainedEarningsAccumulatedDeficit.description: The cumulative amount of the reporting entity's undistributed earnings or deficit.

SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseRe.label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Payments to be Received
SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseRe.description: Amount of undiscounted cash flows to be received by lessor for sales-type and direct financing leases.

ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue.label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost
ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue.description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ShareBasedCompensation.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
ShareBasedCompensation.description: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares into which fully or partially vested stock options outstanding as of the balance sheet date can be currently converted under the option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted-average price as of the balance sheet date at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance on vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The number of shares under options that were cancelled during the reporting period as a result of occurrence of a terminating event specified in contractual agreements pertaining to the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Gross
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Gross number of share options (or share units) granted during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average grant-date fair value of options granted during the reporting period as calculated by applying the disclosed option pricing methodology.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Forfeitures in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to stock options that were terminated.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Exercise Price Range, Lower Range Limit
ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The floor of a customized range of exercise prices for purposes of disclosing shares potentially issuable under outstanding stock option awards on all stock option plans and other required information pertaining to awards in the customized range.

ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Option, Exercise Price Range, Upper Range Limit
ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The ceiling of a customized range of exercise prices for purposes of disclosing shares potentially issuable under outstanding stock option awards on all stock option plans and other required information pertaining to awards in the customized range.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares
Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested Options Forfeited, Weighted Average Grant Date Fair Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options forfeited.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Option, Nonvested, Weighted Average Exercise Price
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average grant-date fair value of non-vested options outstanding.

ShortTermBorrowings.label: Short-term Debt
ShortTermBorrowings.description: Reflects the total carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of debt having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.label: State and Local Income Tax Expense (Benefit), Continuing Operations
StateAndLocalIncomeTaxExpenseBenefitCont.description: Amount of state and local current and deferred income tax expense (benefit) attributable to continuing operations.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.label: Stockholders' Equity, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttrib.description: Amount of stockholders' equity (deficit), net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity, attributable to both the parent and noncontrolling interests. Amount excludes temporary equity. Alternate caption for the concept is permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of shares of capital stock issued (purchased by employees) in connection with an employee stock ownership plan.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesShareBasedC.description: Number, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Ownership Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate value of stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, New Issues
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueNewIssues.description: Equity impact of the value of new stock issued during the period. Includes shares issued in an initial public offering or a secondary public offering.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.label: Shares Issued, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, before Forfeiture
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueShareBasedCo.description: Value, before forfeiture, of shares issued under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

StockOptionPlanExpense.label: Stock or Unit Option Plan Expense
StockOptionPlanExpense.description: Amount of noncash expense for option under share-based payment arrangement.

StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Redeemed or Called During Period, Shares
StockRedeemedOrCalledDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of stock bought back by the entity at the exercise price or redemption price.

StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Authorized Amount
StockRepurchaseProgramAuthorizedAmount1.description: Amount of stock repurchase plan authorized.

SubordinatedDebt.label: Subordinated Debt
SubordinatedDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TierOneLeverageCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 leverage capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredToBeWellCa.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapital.description: Amount of Tier 1 risk-based capital as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Amount of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAss.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Actual
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalToRiskWeightedAss.description: Ratio of Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.label: Transfer of Loans Held-for-sale to Portfolio Loans
TransferOfLoansHeldForSaleToPortfolioLoa.description: Value of loans held-for-sale transferred to loans held in the entity's portfolio in noncash transactions.

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.label: Treasury Stock Acquired, Average Cost Per Share
TreasuryStockAcquiredAverageCostPerShare.description: Total cost of shares repurchased divided by the total number of shares repurchased.

TreasuryStockCommonShares.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Shares
TreasuryStockCommonShares.description: Number of previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Par Value Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the par value method.

UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.label: Unamortized Loan Commitment and Origination Fees and Unamortized Discounts or Premiums
UnamortizedLoanCommitmentAndOriginationF.description: Amount of deferred fees paid by borrowers and unamortized costs incurred to originate loans and leases, unamortized loan commitments and loan syndication fees, and premiums over or discounts from face amounts of loans that are being amortized into income as an adjustment to yield. Excludes amounts for loans and leases covered under loss sharing agreements.

UnearnedESOPShares.label: Unearned ESOP Shares
UnearnedESOPShares.description: Fair value of unearned shares for all classes of common stock and nonredeemable preferred stock (or preferred stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer) held by an employee stock ownership plan (ESOP). Includes the sale of shares or the issuance treasury shares to an ESOP.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.label: Weighted Average Number Diluted Shares Outstanding Adjustment
WeightedAverageNumberDilutedSharesOutsta.description: The sum of dilutive potential common shares or units used in the calculation of the diluted per-share or per-unit computation.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesEmployeeSto.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Shares Not Committed to be Released
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesEmployeeSto.description: Number of employee stock ownership plan (ESOP) shares that have not been committed to be released determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that these shares have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Issued, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesIssuedBasic.description: This element represents the weighted average total number of shares issued throughout the period including the first (beginning balance outstanding) and last (ending balance outstanding) day of the period before considering any reductions (for instance, shares held in treasury) to arrive at the weighted average number of shares outstanding. Weighted average relates to the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares have been issued and outstanding to the total time in that period. Such concept is used in determining the weighted average number of shares outstanding for purposes of calculating earnings per share (basic).

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Intangible Assets
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesGoodwillAndIntangi.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from intangible assets other than goodwill.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Dividend, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPWeightedAv.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Weighted Average Purchase Price of Shares Purchased
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPWeightedAv.description: Weighted average purchase price of capital shares purchased through an employee stock ownership plan.

IncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsEmp.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Dividend, Amount
IncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsEmp.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-based Payment Arrangements
IncrementalCommonSharesAttributableToSha.description: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.label: Payments to Acquire Loans Held-for-investment
PaymentsToAcquireLoansHeldForInvestment.description: The cash outflow associated with purchasing loans held for investment purposes during the period.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
AvailableForSaleSecuritiesDebtMaturities.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferTo.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Allowance for Credit Loss, Expense
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransferTo.description: Amount of expense for allowance for credit loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value, with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCre.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss and Fee
FinancingReceivableBeforeAllowanceForCre.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss and fee, of financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.label: Financing Receivable, 90 Days or More Past Due, Still Accruing
FinancingReceivableRecordedInvestment90D.description: Amount of financing receivable 90 days or more past due and still accruing.

FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.label: Financing Receivable, Unamortized Loan Fee (Cost)
FinancingReceivableUnamortizedLoanFeeCos.description: Amount of unamortized loan commitment, origination, and other fees (costs) on financing receivable. Excludes financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesSi.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Maturity, without Single Maturity Date, Amortized Cost
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesWi.description: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), without single maturity date and not allocated over maturity grouping.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesInUnrealizedLoss.label: Held-to-maturity, Securities in Unrealized Loss Positions, Qualitative Disclosure, Number of Positions
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesInUnrealizedLoss.description: Disclosure regarding factors used to determine that the impairment of securities categorized as held-to-maturity where cost exceeds fair value is not an other than temporary impairment (OTTI). This item contains disclosure of the number of investment positions in the held-to-maturity investments determined to be temporarily impaired.

LeaseCost.label: Lease, Cost
LeaseCost.description: Amount of lease cost recognized by lessee for lease contract.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year One
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Four
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Three
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Two
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsRem.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease having initial or remaining lease term in excess of one year to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDi.label: Financing Receivable, Held-for-Sale, Not Part of Disposal Group, after Valuation Allowance
LoansReceivableHeldForSaleNetNotPartOfDi.description: Amount, after valuation allowance, of financing receivable held for sale and not part of disposal group. Excludes loan covered under loss sharing agreement and loan classified as investment in debt security.

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit) on adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

OperatingLeaseCost.label: Operating Lease, Cost
OperatingLeaseCost.description: Amount of single lease cost, calculated by allocation of remaining cost of lease over remaining lease term. Includes, but is not limited to, single lease cost, after impairment of right-of-use asset, calculated by amortization of remaining right-of-use asset and accretion of lease liability.

OperatingLeaseLiability.label: Operating Lease, Liability
OperatingLeaseLiability.description: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease.

OperatingLeasePayments.label: Operating Lease, Payments
OperatingLeasePayments.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease, excluding payments to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
OperatingLeaseRightOfUseAsset.description: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.label: Operating Lease, Weighted Average Discount Rate, Percent
OperatingLeaseWeightedAverageDiscountRat.description: Weighted average discount rate for operating lease calculated at point in time.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTransfersFro.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer from Held-to-Maturity, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment, after Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTransfersFro.description: Amount, after tax and before adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer from Held-to-Maturity, Gain (Loss), before Adjustment and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Amount, before tax and adjustment, of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.label: Payments to Acquire Held-to-maturity Securities
PaymentsToAcquireHeldToMaturitySecuritie.description: Amount of cash outflow through purchase of long-term held-to-maturity securities.

RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.label: Right-of-Use Asset Obtained in Exchange for Operating Lease Liability
RightOfUseAssetObtainedInExchangeForOper.description: Amount of increase in right-of-use asset obtained in exchange for operating lease liability.

SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseRe.label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable
SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseRe.description: Present value of lease payments not yet received by lessor and amount expected to be derived from underlying asset, following end of lease term guaranteed by lessee or other third party unrelated to lessor, from sales-type and direct financing leases.

SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseRe.label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Lease Receivable, Undiscounted Excess Amount
SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesLeaseRe.description: Amount of undiscounted lease receivable in excess of discounted receivable for sales-type and direct financing leases.

ShortTermLeaseCost.label: Short-term Lease, Cost
ShortTermLeaseCost.description: Amount of short-term lease cost, excluding expense for lease with term of one month or less.

VariableLeaseCost.label: Variable Lease, Cost
VariableLeaseCost.description: Amount of variable lease cost, excluded from lease liability, recognized when obligation for payment is incurred for finance and operating leases.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, Undiscounted Excess Amount
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityUndiscounte.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payments in excess of discounted obligation for lease payments for operating lease.

ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.label: Proceeds from Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
ProceedsFromShortTermDebtMaturingInMoreT.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Shares
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodShares.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and have not been retired and are not held in treasury. Some state laws may govern the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.label: Stock Repurchased During Period, Value
StockRepurchasedDuringPeriodValue.description: Equity impact of the value of stock that has been repurchased during the period and has not been retired and is not held in treasury. Some state laws may mandate the circumstances under which an entity may acquire its own stock and prescribe the accounting treatment therefore. This element is used when state law does not recognize treasury stock.

InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.label: Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks and Other Financial Institutions
InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.description: For banks and other depository institutions (including Federal Reserve Banks, if applicable): Interest-bearing deposits in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits, which are presented separately from cash on the balance sheet.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStoc.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Stock Split
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalStoc.description: Amount of decrease in additional paid in capital (APIC) resulting from a stock split in which per-share par value or stated value is not changed proportionately.

AssetsFairValueDisclosure.label: Assets, Fair Value Disclosure
AssetsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Effective Percentage
DebtInstrumentInterestRateEffectivePerce.description: Effective interest rate for the funds borrowed under the debt agreement considering interest compounding and original issue discount or premium.

EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Exercise of Option, Tax Benefit
EmployeeServiceShareBasedCompensationTax.description: Amount of tax benefit from exercise of option under share-based payment arrangement.

LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.label: Lessee, Operating Lease, Liability, to be Paid, Year Five
LesseeOperatingLeaseLiabilityPaymentsDue.description: Amount of lessee's undiscounted obligation for lease payment for operating lease to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.label: Financial and Nonfinancial Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

OperatingLeaseExpense.label: Operating Lease, Expense
OperatingLeaseExpense.description: Amount of operating lease expense. Excludes sublease income.

ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMat.label: Proceeds from (Repayments of) Short-term Debt, Maturing in More than Three Months
ProceedsFromRepaymentsOfShortTermDebtMat.description: The cash inflow from a borrowing net of the cash outflow from repayment of a borrowing having initial term of repayment of more than three months but less than one year or one operating cycle (if the normal cycle is more than one year).

TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.description: Ratio of Tier 1 capital to average assets as defined by regulatory framework.
